channel.title: How do I get rid of all this null?!
channel.description: My server has null on it like 47 times and its lagging badly cause of it. How do I stop null from coming on my server?

item.title: How do I get rid of all this null?!
item.dc:creator: @legendzpker legendzpker
item.source: How do I get rid of all this null?!

item.title: How do I get rid of all this null?!
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Hmmm… no wonder nulls attack your server. Make it more safe. I made a anti-null void long time ago, can’t remember how it was, but it stopped every single “null” from approaching my server and because of that there wasn’t any nulls in my server.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I get rid of all this null?!

item.title: How do I get rid of all this null?!
item.dc:creator: @legendzpker legendzpker
item.description:
@legendzpker wrote:

Eh Pretty Easy:

Wow Dell, your smart. He doesn’t mean those fucking whoopsies which pop up as nulls, he means the nulls that look like players and make the server lagg. To stop nulls from attacking your server, don’t put your server on any server status pages. The pages somehow ping your server and by that bring nulls to your server, so just advertise your server in the server advertisement section.

we all still get nulls lol even if not on status page and im using ham freaking noobish so it is

Read full topic

item.title: How do I get rid of all this null?!
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Wow Dell, your smart. He doesn’t mean those fucking whoopsies which pop up as nulls, he means the nulls that act as players and make the server lagg. To stop nulls from attacking your server, don’t put your server on any server status pages. The pages somehow ping your server and opens your port and the nulls attack your server. Just advertise your servers in the Server Advertisement section.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I get rid of all this null?!
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

mines pimpscape

[code] public void run() {
// we just accepted a new connection - handle the login stuff
isActive = false;
long serverSessionKey = 0, clientSessionKey = 0;
// randomize server part of the session key
serverSessionKey = ((long)(java.lang.Math.random() * 99999999D) << 32) + (long)(java.lang.Math.random() * 99999999D);

	try {
		fillInStream(2);
		if(inStream.readUnsignedByte() != 14) {
			disconnected = true;
			PlayerHandler.players[playerId] = null;
			return;[/code]

item.title: How do I get rid of all this null?!
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Look for your run() method in client.java and find this

if(inStream.readUnsignedByte() != 14) { disconnected = true; return; }
Once you find that replace with this:

if(inStream.readUnsignedByte() != 14) { disconnected = true; PlayerHandler.players[playerId] = null; return; }

That’s the tutorial of Miss Silabsoft.

Read full topic
